item.description:
Hey All...

This place comes with great reviews from several members! For all you Bloody Mary enthusiasts out there, this one is for you :)

2PM in Inman Sq at:

East Coast Grill (4 star rating
1269 Cambridge St
Cambridge, MA 02139
(617) 491-6568
eastcoastgrill.net

Looking forward to making my own Bloody Mary! I love mine with lots... of horseradish!!!

Cheers,
Michael

group.name: Brunch & More (20/30-Somethings for brunch & more, etc...)

item.name: Make your own Bloody Mary! & Brunch at The East Coast Grill - Inman Sq.
